rootControl.description: The root control which the runtime authoring should handle
rootControl.helpDescription: The root control which the runtime authoring should handle

sap.ui.rta.RuntimeAuthoring.description: The runtime authoring allows to adapt the fields of a running application.
sap.ui.rta.RuntimeAuthoring.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new sap.ui.rta.RuntimeAuthoring class. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object. The supported settings are:
  • Properties
    • {@link #getCustomFieldUrl customFieldUrl} : string
    • {@link #getShowCreateCustomField showCreateCustomField} : boolean
    • {@link #getShowToolbars showToolbars} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowSettingsDialog showSettingsDialog} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowWindowUnloadDialog showWindowUnloadDialog} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getCommandStack commandStack} : sap.ui.rta.command.Stack
  • Events
    • {@link #event:start start} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:stop stop} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:selectionChange selectionChange} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:undoRedoStackModified undoRedoStackModified} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.ManagedObject#constructor sap.ui.core.ManagedObject} can be used as well.

showCreateCustomField.description: Whether the create custom field button should be shown
showCreateCustomField.helpDescription: Whether the create custom field button should be shown

showSettingsDialog.description:
Temporary property : whether to show a dialog for changing control's properties#
should be removed after DTA will fully switch to a property panel
showSettingsDialog.helpDescription:

should be removed after DTA will fully switch to a property panel

showWindowUnloadDialog.helpDescription: Whether the window unload dialog should be shown

showToolbars.helpDescription: Whether the create custom field button should be shown

customFieldUrl.description: The URL which is called when the custom field dialog is opened
customFieldUrl.helpDescription: The URL which is called when the custom field dialog is opened
